Get and set CellGraph object data

CellGraphData.Rd

Get and set CellGraph object data

Usage

CellGraphData(object, slot = "cellgraph")

CellGraphData(object, slot = "cellgraph") <- value

Arguments

object

A CellGraph object

slot

Information to pull from object (cellgraph, meta_data, layout)

value

A new variable to place in slot

Value

GetCellGraphData: A CellGraph object slot

CellGraphData<-: A CellGraph with updated data

Examples


library(pixelatorR)
library(dplyr)
library(tidygraph)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘tidygraph’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:stats’:
#> 
#>     filter

edge_list <-
  ReadMPX_item(
    system.file("extdata/PBMC_10_cells",
                "Sample01_test.pxl",
                package = "pixelatorR"),
    items = "edgelist"
  )
#> ℹ Loading item(s) from: /private/var/folders/gw/bdcqhnvs0m9gs_mq8n51jtbc0000gn/T/RtmpRWMBTZ/temp_libpath418c351441dd/pixelatorR/extdata/PBMC_10_cells/Sample01_test.pxl
#> →   Loading edgelist data
#> ✔ Returning a 'tbl_df' object
bipart_graph <-
  edge_list %>%
  select(upia, upib, marker) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  as_tbl_graph(directed = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(node_type = case_when(name %in% edge_list$upia ~ "A", TRUE ~ "B"))
attr(bipart_graph, "type") <- "bipartite"

cg <- CreateCellGraphObject(cellgraph = bipart_graph)

# Get slot data
CellGraphData(cg, slot = "cellgraph")
#> # A tbl_graph: 26964 nodes and 46655 edges
#> #
#> # An undirected multigraph with 767 components
#> #
#> # Node Data: 26,964 × 2 (active)
#>    name                      node_type
#>    <chr>                     <chr>    
#>  1 AAGAGCATGGTGGGTACGATATGGA A        
#>  2 ATCAATATCGCTAGCGAAGAACACA A        
#>  3 ATGTTCGGCGTTGTTAGTCGGGACA A        
#>  4 TAGTATCTCGAAGGGATTCGGTGGT A        
#>  5 TGATGGTGGCATAATGGTGTATATT A        
#>  6 ACAGCGCAATCTCATAGAGGTATAT A        
#>  7 AATATTCGGGGTACTCCGGGGTAAT A        
#>  8 GGAAGGTACAGGGCCAACGGAAGTT A        
#>  9 TGATCTTGAATTAGGTTGTGTGATA A        
#> 10 ATTTCTGTTTAGCACGTGAGCATGA A        
#> # ℹ 26,954 more rows
#> #
#> # Edge Data: 46,655 × 3
#>    from    to marker
#>   <int> <int> <chr> 
#> 1     1 19085 CD72  
#> 2     2 19086 CD72  
#> 3     3 19087 CD72  
#> # ℹ 46,652 more rows

# Set slot data
CellGraphData(cg, slot = "cellgraph") <- CellGraphData(cg, slot = "cellgraph")
